entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 6:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along the coast in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the coast in the evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
